alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Juan County through 600 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Canyonlands National Park, or 32 miles southwest of Moab, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, pea size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canyonlands National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
